title: Do Not Fear Week 1 with Sissy Goff
description:
For the first week of our Do Not Fear reading plan, Raechel and Amanda are joined by best-selling author and counselor, Sissy Goff. Building a foundation for the next three weeks of discussion, they explore the hope and goal of this plan—not that we would be cured of fear in three weeks, but that we learn to look to the One who is faithful in our fear. Throughout the episode, the three explore not only their own experiences with fear, but look to stories of Scripture where men and women learned about God’s character and saw His action on display amid their fear-filled circumstances. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Do Not Fear reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Do Not Fear collection at https://www.shopshereadstruth.com/collections/do-not-fear. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/do-not-fear-week-1-with-sissy-goff.
